overview:
Emil Koutanov is the key technologist for gTrade, with extensive software experiences in Java and Transactional Processing.

Emil has obtained a Bachelor of Engineering in Software from the University of Technology, Sydney. He excelled while at University, producing outstanding results and achievements. The University of Technology, Sydney has awarded Emil with Honors for his outstanding contribution and achievements.

Emil is a lead Java programmer at Media and Gaming Pty Ltd, Australia. In this role, Emil is responsible for developing gambling systems for international trade with extremely high uptime. Emil develops and maintains Transactional databases for extremely high throughput and reliability. Emil has also had extensive experience in this role with currency exchange and financial transactions. Emil has also had experience in software certification and legal requirements for financial transactions.

Obsidian Dynamics is a Java programming company founded and directed by Emil. Obsidian Dynamics has developed a data store and transactional processing system specifically designed for the high demands of financial transactions.
